20110130013712.000|20110130013713.000|CC1|>> PEOPLE ARE HERE TO           
20110130013713.000|20110130013715.000|CC1|CONGRATULATE THEM FOR FINALLY   
20110130013715.000|20110130013718.000|CC1|STANDING UP FOR THEIR RIGHTS.
